name: Cadence of the Naval Storm
description:
Cadence of the naval storm

Goal of the game

You are stuck in the middle of the sea in a big storm with pirates ships and krakens.

The goal is to survive for the longest time with the help of the rythm of the music. All actions in the game are triggered by each beat. You must register the action in advance before the beat arrives.

Game jam info
 - Chosen theme : tempête
 - Difficulty : débutant

Game jam team
 - Nicolas Maier (Programmation, guitar)
 - Gilles Waeber (Programmation)
 - Denis Rosset (Programmation, guitar and bass)
 - Samuel Baula (Programmation, 2D drawing, sound design)
 - Joachim Koerfer (3D modelling, 2D, music production and composition)
